en.awaitingClarificationTitle: You need to provide more information
en.awaitingClarificationNotSatisfied: The court has reviewed your case and is not yet satisfied that you're entitled to a decree of divorce, You can read the court's reasons for this in the Refusal order ({{ refusalOrderFile.fileType | upper }}).
en.awaitingClarificationProvideMoreInfo: You need to provide more information or evidence before your application can proceed.
